pageContext.claim: “Today, my Administration is launching the most sweeping action in history to lower the price of prescription drugs for the American People. We will have tougher negotiation, more competition, and much lower prices at the pharmacy counter!”
pageContext.analysis: Various health-care experts dispute Trump's claim that his plan to lower prescription drug prices would cut costs meaningfully for consumers. Trump once promised to allow Medicare to negotiate drug prices, but this did not end up in his plan.
